CameraMovement

type: C enum
CAMERA_MOVEMENT_FORWARD
CAMERA_MOVEMENT_BACKWARD
CAMERA_MOVEMENT_LEFT
CAMERA_MOVEMENT_RIGHT
CAMERA_MOVEMENT_UP

FreeflyCamera

typedef struct {
  mat4  view;
  vec3  position;
  vec3  front;
  vec3  up;
  vec3  right;
  vec3  world_up;
  float yaw;
  float pitch;
  bool  lock_pitch;
  bool  invert_y;
  float movement_speed;
  float sensitivity;
  float zoom;
  float zoom_max;
  float zoom_min;
} FreeflyCamera;
type: C struct

f_camera_freefly_reset

void f_camera_freefly_reset(FreeflyCamera *camera, vec3 pos);
type: C function

f_camera_freefly_move

void f_camera_freefly_move(FreeflyCamera *camera, CameraMovement movement, float delta_time);
type: C function

f_camera_freefly_zoom

void f_camera_freefly_zoom(FreeflyCamera *camera, float value);
type: C function

f_camera_freefly_set_position

void f_camera_freefly_set_position(FreeflyCamera *camera, vec3 pos);
type: C function

f_camera_freefly_look_at

void f_camera_freefly_look_at(FreeflyCamera *camera, vec3 at);
type: C function

f_camera_freefly_look

void f_camera_freefly_look(FreeflyCamera *camera, float x_offset, float y_offset);
type: C function
